11 UCB1::UCB1(unsigned int nArms_, double c_) :
12  nArms(nArms_), c(c_),
13  muList(nArms), nList(nArms), discardFlags(nArms),
14  nDiscardedArms(0), nSum(0)
15 {
16  assert(nArms != 0);
17 
18 
19  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nArms; ++i)
20  {
21  muList[i] = 0.0;
22  nList[i] = 0;
23  discardFlags[i] = false;
24  }
25 }
26 
27 
28 // ===========================================================================
29 // Public methods
30 // ===========================================================================
31 int UCB1::run(unsigned int n)
32 {
33  // Initialization: draw each arm one time (if needed)
34  for (unsigned int i = 0; ((i < nArms) && (n > 0)); ++i)
35  {
36  if (nList[i] == 0)
37  {
38  try
39  {
40  muList[i] = drawArm(i);
41  ++nList[i];
42  ++nSum;
43  --n;
44  }
45 
46  catch (std::exception& e)
47  {
48  discardFlags[i] = true;
49  ++nDiscardedArms;
50  continue;
51  }
52  }
53  }
54 
55 
56  // Convergence criteria: same arm drawn several times in a row
57  while ((n > 0) && (nDiscardedArms < nArms))
58  {
59  // 1. Compute the 'score' associated to each arm with respect
60  // to UCB1 formula
61  vector<double> ucbScoreList(nArms);
62  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nArms; ++i)
63  {
64  if (discardFlags[i]) { ucbScoreList[i] = -DBL_MAX; }
65  else
66  {
67  ucbScoreList[i]
68  = (muList[i] + (c * sqrt(log(nSum) / nList[i])));
69  }
70  }
71 
72 
73  // 2. Select the arm which obtained the best score
74  vector<vector<double>::const_iterator> maxList;
75  maxList = utils::search::max<vector<double> >(
76  ucbScoreList.begin(), ucbScoreList.end());
77 
78  int maxI = RandomGen::randIntRange_Uniform(0, (maxList.size() - 1));
79  int s = (maxList[maxI] - ucbScoreList.begin());
80 
81 
82  // 3. Draw the selected arm and update the data
83  try
84  {
85  double drawScore = drawArm(s);
86  muList[s] *= ((double) nList[s] / (nList[s] + 1.0));
87  muList[s] += ((1.0 / (nList[s] + 1.0)) * drawScore);
88  ++nList[s];
89  ++nSum;
90  --n;
91  }
92 
93  catch (std::exception& e)
94  {
95  discardFlags[s] = true;
96  ++nDiscardedArms;
97  continue;
98  }
99  }
100 
101  // Return -1 if all arms have been discarded
102  if (nDiscardedArms >= nArms) { return -1; }
103 
104 
105  // Return the most drawn arm else
106  vector<vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator> maxList;
107  maxList = utils::search::max<vector<unsigned int> >(
108  nList.begin(), nList.end());
109 
110  int maxI = RandomGen::randIntRange_Uniform(0, (maxList.size() - 1));
111  return (maxList[maxI] - nList.begin());
112 }
113 
114 
115 vector<unsigned int> UCB1::getTop(unsigned int n) const
116 {
117  vector<unsigned int> top;
118  vector<unsigned int> nListTmp = nList;
119  while (n-- > 0)
120  {
121  vector<vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator> maxList;
122  maxList = utils::search::max<vector<unsigned int> >(
123  nListTmp.begin(), nListTmp.end());
124 
125  int maxI = RandomGen::randIntRange_Uniform(0, (maxList.size() - 1));
126  top.push_back(maxList[maxI] - nListTmp.begin());
127  nListTmp[maxList[maxI] - nListTmp.begin()] = 0;
128  }
129 
130  return top;
131 }
utils::RandomGen::randIntRange_Uniform
static int randIntRange_Uniform(int min, int max)
Returns an integer in [min; max] range, following a uniform distribution.
Definition: RandomGen.cpp:88
std
utils::UCB1::run
int run(unsigned int n)
Draw 'n' arms and return the index of the arm which has been drawn the most.
